name: Long-Term Memory
description: Vector-based memory storage and retrieval using SQLite and FAISS.

config.arbiter_prompt:
Extract concise, self-contained facts from the text below (Subject: {subject}).
Rules:
1. Return ONLY a JSON list of strings. Example: ["User lives in Paris"]
2. Replace pronouns (it, he, she, they) with specific names/entities to make facts standalone.
3. Ignore greetings, questions, generic small talk, and general world knowledge (e.g. geography, history, science facts).
4. Focus on personal details, preferences, specific events, or new instructions.
5. If no useful facts are found, return [].

Text: "{text}"

JSON:

provides_nodes.name: Memory Recall
provides_nodes.description: Searches memory for relevant context and adds it to the conversation.

provides_nodes.name: Memory Save
provides_nodes.description: Stores the current interaction into long-term memory.

provides_nodes.name: Check Goal
provides_nodes.description: Retrieves the current active goal and injects it into the conversation context.
